CombatExtended.AmmoCategoryDef.label: toxic gas
CombatExtended.AmmoCategoryDef.description: This shell contains a potent, nerve agent which is extremely harmful to anyone exposed.

CombatExtended.AmmoCategoryDef.label: rage gas
CombatExtended.AmmoCategoryDef.description: This shell contains a potent, specialized airborne agent that induces blind, uncontrollable rage.

CombatExtended.AmmoCategoryDef.label: tear gas
CombatExtended.AmmoCategoryDef.description: This shell contains a potent, specialized airborne agent that attacks the sensitive membranes of the eyes and nose, making it difficult to sea or breathe.

CombatExtended.AmmoCategoryDef.label: fear gas
CombatExtended.AmmoCategoryDef.description: This shell contains a potent, specialized airborne agent that induces an extremely strong feeling of dread and terror.

CombatExtended.AmmoCategoryDef.label: sleeping gas
CombatExtended.AmmoCategoryDef.description: This shell contains a potent sedative, capable of quickly rendering unconscious anyone exposed.

CombatExtended.AmmoCategoryDef.label: acid
CombatExtended.AmmoCategoryDef.description: This shell contains an extremely acid, capable of quickly burning away flesh and metal alike.
